long_description: The stretch-woven fabric and relaxed fit of the Brooks Sherpa III shorts draw you into dynamic motion no matter what your training routine entails. Polyester and spandex fabric features plenty of stretch to enhance mobility. Soft polyester liner moves moisture away from skin to ensure dry comfort. Dual rear pockets store workout essentials. Elastic drawcord waist.
short_description: The stretch-woven fabric and relaxed fit of the Brooks Sherpa III shorts draw you into dynamic motion no matter what your training routine entails.
